name: storageify
author: Daniel Lopes <lopsch@googlemail.com>
description: Store/read Cycle.js state (from Cycle.js onionify) in/from HTML5 Local Storage

scripts.test: rm -rf istanbul mochawesome && nyc mocha --colors --require babel-register --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportFilename=index,reportDir=mochawesome,quiet=false,enableCode=false
scripts.coverage: export BABEL_ENV=production && npm run build && unset BABEL_ENV && npm run test && nyc check-coverage --lines 0 --functions 0 --branches 0 --statements 0
scripts.build: rm -rf lib && npm run fix && rollup -c -m true
scripts.ci: npm run clean && npm run coverage && npm run build && npm run doc
scripts.fix: prettier --write --print-width 80 --tab-width 2 --no-semi --single-quote --trailing-comma none --jsx-bracket-same-line --parser babylon src/**/*.js test/**/*.js && eslint --fix src/**/*.js test/**/*.js
